snippet: Wednesday’s highlights from around the Web include a report that Snapchat, a photo-messaging service, rejected a $3 billion offer from Facebook. Plus, Yahoo auctions off old domains, including sandwich.com.
abstract: Wednesday’s highlights from around the Web include a report that Snapchat, a photo-messaging service, rejected a $3 billion offer from Facebook. Plus, Yahoo auctions off old domains, including sandwich.com.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: A Snapchat Spurn, and Yahoo to Shed Sandwich.com
